extension.news: 6.1.0 [add] Multi-user support - Switch User folder (default: on) Settings -> Folders - User management (Add, Remove, Rename, Switch) Settings - Users - Signed in users are green, Current user has an * [add/upd] add data cache and optimize caching - add Settings -> Maintenance -> Clear data cache/Delete data cache - increase allowed cache size - database accesses per 50 videos: before: 70~100 after: 4~6 - load time of 50 videos w/ no cached videos: before: ~11.6 secs, after: ~3 secs - load time of 50 videos w/ all cached videos: before: ~0.8 secs, after: ~0.7 secs - cached size per 50 videos: before ~1MB, after ~550KB [add] Refresh after watching (default: off) Settings -> General [add] Completed Live folder (default: on) Settings -> Folders [add] Upcoming Live folder (default: on) Settings -> Folders [add] My Location folder (default: on) Settings -> Advanced -> Enable setup-wizard [add] Play count minimum percent (default: 85%) Settings -> General -> Play count minimum percent [add] Playback history (default: off) Settings -> Advanced -> Use playback history [add] Time since published for videos as item properties Property(PublishedSince), Property(PublishedLocal) |contrib: pannal| [upd] YouTube UTC datetimes to local timezone |contrib: pannal| [upd] Localize API key errors, provide a more descriptive notification [fix] My Channel videos (Error 403) [fix] allow fallback to dash, when using Audio only [fix] Signature function not found error for some users [fix] Context Menu -> More -> Related Videos w/ Kodi 18 [fix] Sign In/Sign Out causing crash with Kodi 18 nightlies [fix] Channel 'mine' caching [lang] Spanish strings |contrib: roliverosc| [lang] Greek strings |contrib: twilight0|
extension.description: YouTube is one of the biggest video-sharing websites of the world.
extension.disclaimer: This plugin is not endorsed by Google
extension.description: YouTube הוא אחד מאתרי שיתוף הווידאו הגדולים בעולם.
YouTube ist eines der größten Video-Sharing-Websites der Welt.
YouTube jest jednym z największych na świecie serwisów udostępniania wideo.
A YouTube világ egyik legnagyobb videómegosztó weboldala.
YouTube es uno de los mayores sitios web de intercambio de vídeos del mundo.
extension.disclaimer: Este add-on no esta respaldado por Google
extension.description: Данное дополнение позволяет находить и смотреть видео на всеми любимом сайте.
YouTube est l'un des plus grands sites de partage vidéos du monde.
「Youtube」是全世界最大的影片分享網站
YouTube е един от най-големите уеб сайтове за споделяне на видео в целия свят.
Το YouTube είναι μία από τις μεγαλύτερες ιστοσελίδες διαμοιρασμού βίντεο στον κόσμο.
extension.disclaimer: Η παρούσα μικροεφαρμογή δεν έχει υϊοθετηθεί από την Google
extension.description: YouTube er en av verdens største nettsider for videodeling.
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 2, June 1991
